basics.name: Anirudh Kaushik
basics.label: Undergraduate Researcher
basics.summary: I am a Horse Rider and a certified Advanced Open Water Scuba-Diver with 25 logged dives in 6 different countries. I enjoy playing the guitar and the piano.

work.name: Microsoft
work.summary: Incoming Software Engineering Intern at Microsoft for Summer 2024

work.name: CVIT, IIIT Hyderabad
work.position: Undergraduate Researcher in Computer Vision for Medical Diagnosis
work.summary: Research on topics related to the application of Computer Vision for Solving problems in the field of medicine. My interest include disease identification and diagnosis, as well as modelling and simulating the progress of diseases.

courses: Design and Analysis of Software Systems

publications.name: Evidence Driven Differential Diagnosis of Malignant Melanoma
publications.summary: We present a modular and multi-level framework for the differential diagnosis of malignant melanoma. Our framework integrates contextual information and evidence at the lesion, patient, and population levels, enabling decision-making at each level
